wake.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to stop sleeping, or to make someone stop sleeping
wake.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: When she woke, the sun was streaming through the windows.
Try not to wake the baby.
Nancy woke to the sound of birds outside her window  (=she heard birds singing when she woke).
wake.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the time before or after a funeral when friends and relatives meet to remember the dead person
wake.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: the track made behind a boat as it moves through the water
